actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code, to provide that certain additional amounts received by retired servicemen employed in the Junior Reserve Officers' Training Corps shall be treated as subsistence or uniform allowances or as amounts received as commutation of quarters.

summary.text: Provides that additional amounts received by retired servicemen employed in the Junior Reserve Officers' Training Corps shall be treated as subsistence or uniform allowances or as amounts received as commutation of quarters. (Amends 10 U.S.C. 2031(d)(1))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code, to provide that certain additional amounts received by retired servicemen employed in the Junior Reserve Officers' Training Corps shall be treated as subsistence or uniform allowances or as amounts received as commutation of quarters.
